root.name: Clones
root.description: OverviewClones is a Lemmings inspired puzzle game in which you have to get your clones to safety. Like the Lemmings game, you get a map and have to guide your clones to the exit. The player can use a finite set of tools and commands to put his clones to work or to lead them in the right direction. The game features 150 levels, has an editor and comes with multiplayer options included.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPProcessor: 1.5+ GHz Intel or AMDMemory: 512MB RAMGraphics: 64MB DirectX速 9.0cDirectX速: DirectX速 9.0cHard Drive: 500MBSound: DirectX速 9.0c compliant sound cardMultiplayer: Internet or LAN Connection
